pr_title: ST: Add test which do downgrade to older log message format

timeline.message:
add test which do downgrade to older log message format

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

timeline.body:
```suggestion
           String logMsgFormat = initialVersion.compareTo(newVersion) < 0 ? 
           // If it is an upgrade test we keep the message format as the lower version number
           initialVersion.messageVersion() : 
           // If it is a downgrade then we make sure to use the lower version number for the message format
           newVersion.messageVersion()
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (initialVersion.compareTo(newVersion) < 0) {
// If it is an upgrade test we keep the message format as the lower version number
logMsgFormat = initialVersion.messageVersion();
} else {
// If it is a downgrade then we make sure to use the lower version number for the message format
logMsgFormat = newVersion.messageVersion();
String logMsgFormat = initialVersion.compareTo(newVersion) < 0 ?
// If it is an upgrade test we keep the message format as the lower version number
initialVersion.messageVersion() :
// If it is a downgrade then we make sure to use the lower version number for the message format
newVersion.messageVersion()
